name: Digi International Inc.
description: Digi International Inc. is a leading global provider of Internet of Things (IoT) connectivity solutions. Established in 1985, Digi specializes in providing devices and services that enable businesses to connect and manage their devices over various networks. The company offers a diverse portfolio of products including cellular routers, gateways, and modules that facilitate machine-to-machine (M2M) communications. Digi's innovative solutions are designed to support applications across a wide range of industries such as industrial automation, smart cities, healthcare, and transportation. With a strong emphasis on security and scalability, Digi International empowers organizations to harness the power of IoT to improve operational efficiency and drive business growth. The company is headquartered in Hopkins, Minnesota, and has a global presence, serving customers in over 100 countries. Digi is committed to simplifying the complexities of IoT deployments, providing robust support and services to ensure successful implementation and management of IoT networks. As the demand for connected devices continues to rise, Digi is at the forefront of enabling the next generation of IoT applications and services, helping businesses transform their operations and unlock new revenue streams.
